column5: What a beautiful weekend to be out on the lake fishing! Not only did the weather cooperate, but the fish were biting too!  We were constantly catching nice perch, and when they would stop hitting, someone would catch a pike. Also caught many herring, white fish and ling. We did really well using white jig heads tipped with a minnow. Here's some pics. All fish were released.
Well done, seels like Nip is picking up
Looks like some good times!!  cheers HD
Great Report Luc, Those are definitely some decent pike! Darcy
Congrats on the good outing Luc! Looks like your comfortably camped out there too! WTG!
Beauty report and pics Luc Great job on the multi species Thanks for sharing Leechman
Sweet man, pike are so fun to catch under the ice. Great job on the walleye also!  Thanks for sharing, MTBF
Wow...what do you guys drink out there?  Your eyes were starting to look a bit red by the end of the day
Thanks Roy. I'd say we have a nice shack. Nice and big at 9x9.   Yeah...  I have a program that removes red eye, but just too lazy. Besides, its the fish you should be looking at!
Good times in the shack.  Nice fish Luc.
